definition: victory/success/to beat/to defeat/to surpass/victorious/superior to/to get the better of/better than/surpassing/superb (of vista)/beautiful (scenery)/wonderful (view)/(Taiwan pr. [sheng1]) able to bear/equal to (a task)

sentences.english: Many words cut (hurt) more than swords.
Water makes the pond more picturesque.
We will extol your love more than wine.
sentences.chinese: 我們要稱讚你的愛情，勝似稱讚美酒。

sentences.english: Making reservations on the phone sure beats waiting in line.
sentences.chinese: 打電話預先定座肯定勝似排隊等候。

definition: lit. cool breeze and bright moon (idiom)/fig. peaceful and clear night/(allusively) living a solitary and quiet life
(literary) to practice medicine/to work as a pharmacist
(of a person) sad beyond words (idiom)/(of music, literature etc) poignant/very sentimental
bridal room and ornamented candles/wedding festivities (idiom)
to lie in disarray/to cut across/to traverse
lit. as round as pearls and as smooth as jade (idiom)/fig. elegant and polished (of singing or writing)
lit. ten thousand stampeding horses (idiom)/fig. with great momentum/going full speed ahead
